CustomField.description: The geo precision needs to be less than 100m, then we need to know the addressee details, a check between the two GPS details is then performed, if: The two locations are within 50m – Delivery continues as per normal – The delivery event will record with “Outside Delivery Radius = No The two locations are greater than 50m – Pop up received on scanner – Driver confirms at the right location “Outside Delivery Radius = Yes
CustomField.label: Outside Delivery Radius
